BEGIN;

  /* База источников */
  WITH ns AS (
    SELECT
      s.id_source::text        AS id_source,
      s.type::int              AS source_type,
      s.date_time              AS source_date_time,
      s.updated_at             AS source_updated_at,
      s.id_user::bigint        AS manager_id,
      s.id_uniq::bigint        AS id_uniq
    FROM raw.itcrm_new_source s
  ),
  /* уникальные связи source↔request */
  rr AS (
    SELECT
      irr.id_source::text AS id_source,
      irr.id_request::int AS id_request
    FROM raw.itcrm_internet_request_relation irr
    GROUP BY irr.id_source, irr.id_request
  ),
  /* агрегируем по source */
  rel AS (
    SELECT
      id_source,
      ARRAY_AGG(id_request ORDER BY id_request)::int[] AS request_ids,
      MIN(id_request)                                  AS primary_request_id
    FROM rr
    GROUP BY id_source
  ),
  /* все codes по всем IR конкретного source */
  all_codes AS (
    SELECT
      r.id_source,
      JSONB_AGG(
        CASE
          WHEN a.code IS NOT NULL AND jsonb_typeof(a.code) IN ('object','array')
          THEN a.code
          ELSE NULL
        END
        ORDER BY a.analytic_id
      ) AS codes
    FROM rr r
    JOIN raw.itcrm_analytics a
      ON a.internet_request_id::int = r.id_request
    GROUP BY r.id_source
  ),
  /* последний code с ПРИОРИТИЗАЦИЕЙ tracking данных */
  last_code AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (r.id_source)
      r.id_source,
      CASE
        WHEN a.code IS NULL THEN NULL
        WHEN jsonb_typeof(a.code) IN ('object','array','string') THEN a.code
        ELSE NULL
      END AS code
    FROM rel r
    JOIN raw.itcrm_analytics a
      ON a.internet_request_id::int IN (SELECT UNNEST(r.request_ids))
    WHERE a.code IS NOT NULL
    ORDER BY
      r.id_source,
      CASE WHEN a.code->>'gclid' IS NOT NULL AND a.code->>'gclid' != '' THEN 1 ELSE 99
   END,
      CASE WHEN a.code->>'fb_lead_id' IS NOT NULL AND a.code->>'fb_lead_id' != '' THEN
   2 ELSE 99 END,
      CASE WHEN a.code->>'fbclid' IS NOT NULL AND a.code->>'fbclid' != '' THEN 3 ELSE
  99 END,
      CASE WHEN a.code ? 'utm_source' THEN 4 ELSE 99 END,
      a.analytic_id DESC
  ),
  /* менеджер */
  mgr AS (
    SELECT u.id_user::bigint AS manager_id, u.login_user AS manager_login
    FROM raw.itcrm_users_ua u
  ),
  /* договор (последний) */
  doc_pick AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (dc.id_source)
      dc.id_source::text AS id_source,
      dc.contract_id::bigint AS contract_id,
      COALESCE(dc.total_cost_of_the_contract, dc.sum2)::numeric AS contract_total
    FROM raw.itcrm_docs_clients dc
    ORDER BY dc.id_source, COALESCE(dc.updated_at, dc.created_at) DESC NULLS LAST
  )

  INSERT INTO dashboards.crm_requests AS tgt (
    id_source, source_type, source_date_time, source_updated_at, id_uniq,
    request_ids, primary_request_id,
    request_created_at, request_type, form_name, email,
    manager_id, manager_login,
    branch_id, branch_name,
    contract_id, contract_total,
    code, codes
  )
  SELECT
    n.id_source,
    n.source_type,
    n.source_date_time,
    n.source_updated_at,
    n.id_uniq,
    r.request_ids,
    r.primary_request_id,
    NULL::timestamp,
    NULL::text,
    NULL::text,
    NULL::text,
    n.manager_id,
    m.manager_login,
    NULL::bigint AS branch_id,
    'kiev'::text AS branch_name,
    d.contract_id,
    d.contract_total,
    lc.code,
    ac.codes
  FROM ns n
  LEFT JOIN rel        r  ON r.id_source = n.id_source
  LEFT JOIN mgr        m  ON m.manager_id = n.manager_id
  LEFT JOIN doc_pick   d  ON d.id_source  = n.id_source
  LEFT JOIN last_code  lc ON lc.id_source = n.id_source
  LEFT JOIN all_codes  ac ON ac.id_source = n.id_source
  ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
    source_type         = EXCLUDED.source_type,
    source_date_time    = EXCLUDED.source_date_time,
    source_updated_at   = EXCLUDED.source_updated_at,
    id_uniq             = EXCLUDED.id_uniq,
    request_ids         = EXCLUDED.request_ids,
    primary_request_id  = EXCLUDED.primary_request_id,
    manager_id          = EXCLUDED.manager_id,
    manager_login       = EXCLUDED.manager_login,
    branch_id           = EXCLUDED.branch_id,
    branch_name         = EXCLUDED.branch_name,
    contract_id         = EXCLUDED.contract_id,
    contract_total      = EXCLUDED.contract_total,
    code                = EXCLUDED.code,
    codes               = EXCLUDED.codes,
    row_updated_at      = now();

  INSERT INTO dashboards.crm_requests AS tgt (
    id_source, source_type, source_date_time, source_updated_at, id_uniq,
    request_ids, primary_request_id, internet_request_id, request_created_at,
    request_type, form_name, email, manager_id, manager_login, branch_id,
    branch_name, contract_id, contract_total, code, codes
  )
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.internet_request_id)
    'A' || a.internet_request_id::text,
    NULL::int,
    a.request_created_at,
    a.request_created_at,
    NULL::bigint,
    ARRAY[a.internet_request_id]::int[],
    a.internet_request_id,
    a.internet_request_id::text,
    a.request_created_at,
    NULL::text,
    NULL::text,
    a.email,
    NULL::bigint,
    NULL::text,
    NULL::bigint,
    'synthetic'::text,
    NULL::bigint,
    NULL::numeric,
    a.code,
    JSONB_BUILD_ARRAY(a.code)
  FROM raw.itcrm_analytics a
  WHERE (
      a.code->>'gclid' IS NOT NULL AND a.code->>'gclid' != ''
      OR a.code->>'fb_lead_id' IS NOT NULL AND a.code->>'fb_lead_id' != ''
      OR a.code ? 'utm_source'
    )
    AND NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM raw.itcrm_internet_request_relation r
      WHERE r.id_request = a.internet_request_id
    )
  ORDER BY
    a.internet_request_id,
    CASE WHEN a.code->>'gclid' IS NOT NULL AND a.code->>'gclid' != '' THEN 1 ELSE 99
  END,
    CASE WHEN a.code->>'fb_lead_id' IS NOT NULL AND a.code->>'fb_lead_id' != '' THEN 2
   ELSE 99 END,
    a.analytic_id DESC
  ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
    code = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.code, tgt.code),
    codes = EXCLUDED.codes,
    row_updated_at = now();

  COMMIT;

BEGIN;

/* Создание индексов если нет */
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_gar_gclid ON dashboards.google_ad_reference(gclid) WHERE gclid IS NOT NULL;
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_gar_campaign_id ON dashboards.google_ad_reference(campaign_id) WHERE campaign_id IS NOT NULL;

WITH clicks AS (
  /* 1 строка на gclid */
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (gc.gclid)
    gc.gclid,
    gc.campaign_id,
    gc.ad_group_id
  FROM raw.google_ads_clicks gc
  WHERE gc.gclid IS NOT NULL 
    AND gc.gclid <> ''
    AND length(gc.gclid) BETWEEN 10 AND 200  -- ✅ валидация
  ORDER BY gc.gclid, gc.campaign_id DESC NULLS LAST, gc.ad_group_id DESC NULLS LAST
),
names AS (
  SELECT
    gn.campaign_id,
    gn.ad_group_id,
    MIN(NULLIF(btrim(gn.campaign_name),'')) AS campaign_name,  -- ✅ trim
    MIN(NULLIF(btrim(gn.ad_group_name),'')) AS ad_group_name
  FROM raw.google_ads_names gn
  WHERE gn.campaign_id IS NOT NULL OR gn.ad_group_id IS NOT NULL  -- ✅ фильтр
  GROUP BY gn.campaign_id, gn.ad_group_id
),
chan AS (
  SELECT
    gcd.campaign_id,
    MIN(NULLIF(btrim(gcd.advertising_channel_type),'')) AS advertising_channel_type
  FROM raw.google_ads_campaign_daily gcd
  WHERE gcd.campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY gcd.campaign_id
),
kw AS (
  SELECT
    k.ad_group_id,
    MIN(NULLIF(btrim(k.keyword_text),'')) AS keyword_text
  FROM raw.google_ads_keyword_daily k
  WHERE k.ad_group_id IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY k.ad_group_id
),
st AS (
  SELECT
    s.ad_group_id,
    MIN(NULLIF(btrim(s.search_term),'')) AS search_term
  FROM raw.google_ads_search_terms_daily s
  WHERE s.ad_group_id IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY s.ad_group_id
)
INSERT INTO dashboards.google_ad_reference AS tgt (
  gclid, campaign_id, campaign_name, advertising_channel_type,
  ad_group_id, ad_group_name, keyword_text, search_term
)
SELECT
  c.gclid,
  c.campaign_id,
  n.campaign_name,
  ch.advertising_channel_type,
  c.ad_group_id,
  n.ad_group_name,
  kw.keyword_text,
  st.search_term
FROM clicks c
LEFT JOIN names n ON n.campaign_id = c.campaign_id AND n.ad_group_id = c.ad_group_id
LEFT JOIN chan  ch ON ch.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
LEFT JOIN kw      ON kw.ad_group_id  = c.ad_group_id
LEFT JOIN st      ON st.ad_group_id  = c.ad_group_id
WHERE c.gclid IS NOT NULL  -- ✅ финальная проверка
ON CONFLICT (gclid) DO UPDATE SET
  campaign_id              = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_id,              tgt.campaign_id),
  campaign_name            = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_name,            tgt.campaign_name),
  advertising_channel_type = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.advertising_channel_type, tgt.advertising_channel_type),
  ad_group_id              = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.ad_group_id,              tgt.ad_group_id),
  ad_group_name            = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.ad_group_name,            tgt.ad_group_name),
  keyword_text             = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.keyword_text,             tgt.keyword_text),
  search_term              = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.search_term,              tgt.search_term),
  row_updated_at           = now();

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    l.*,
    CASE
      WHEN code IS NULL THEN NULL::jsonb
      WHEN jsonb_typeof(code)='object' THEN code
      WHEN jsonb_typeof(code)='string' THEN 
        CASE 
          WHEN (code #>> '{}') ~ '^[\[{]' THEN  -- ✅ проверка JSON структуры
            (code #>> '{}')::jsonb
          ELSE NULL::jsonb
        END
      ELSE NULL::jsonb
    END AS j
  FROM raw.fb_leads l
  WHERE code IS NOT NULL
    AND code::text NOT IN ('', '""', 'null', '[]', '{}')  -- ✅ больше фильтров
),
parsed AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_lead_id'), '')       AS fb_lead_id,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fbclid'), '')           AS fbclid,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_campaign_id'), '')   AS fb_campaign_id,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_adset_id'), '')      AS fb_adset_id,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_ad_id'), '')         AS fb_ad_id,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_campaign_name'), '') AS fb_campaign_name_raw,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_adset_name'), '')    AS fb_adset_name_raw,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_ad_name'), '')       AS fb_ad_name_raw,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_page_id'), '')       AS fb_page_id,
    NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_form_id'), '')       AS fb_form_id,
    COALESCE(
      NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_form_name'), ''), 
      NULLIF(btrim(l.form_name), '')
    ) AS form_name,
    COALESCE(
      NULLIF(btrim(j->>'fb_platform'), ''),  
      NULLIF(btrim(l.platform), '')
    ) AS platform
  FROM base l
  WHERE j IS NOT NULL 
    AND jsonb_typeof(j)='object'
),
dim_names AS (
  SELECT
    p.*,
    fc.name AS campaign_name_dim,
    fa.name AS adset_name_dim
  FROM parsed p
  LEFT JOIN raw.fb_campaigns fc 
    ON fc.campaign_id = p.fb_campaign_id
  LEFT JOIN raw.fb_adsets fa 
    ON fa.adset_id = p.fb_adset_id
)
INSERT INTO dashboards.fb_ad_reference AS tgt (
  fb_lead_id, fbclid,
  campaign_id, campaign_name,
  adset_id, adset_name,
  ad_id, ad_name,
  page_id, form_id, form_name, platform
)
SELECT
  d.fb_lead_id,
  d.fbclid,
  d.fb_campaign_id,
  COALESCE(d.campaign_name_dim, d.fb_campaign_name_raw, 'Unknown') AS campaign_name,
  d.fb_adset_id,
  COALESCE(d.adset_name_dim, d.fb_adset_name_raw) AS adset_name,
  d.fb_ad_id,
  d.fb_ad_name_raw,
  d.fb_page_id,
  d.fb_form_id,
  d.form_name,
  d.platform
FROM dim_names d
WHERE d.fb_lead_id IS NOT NULL 
  AND d.fb_lead_id <> ''
  AND length(d.fb_lead_id) BETWEEN 5 AND 100  -- ✅ валидация
ON CONFLICT (fb_lead_id) DO UPDATE SET
  fbclid        = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.fbclid,        tgt.fbclid),
  campaign_id   = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_id,   tgt.campaign_id),
  campaign_name = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_name, tgt.campaign_name),
  adset_id      = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.adset_id,      tgt.adset_id),
  adset_name    = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.adset_name,    tgt.adset_name),
  ad_id         = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.ad_id,         tgt.ad_id),
  ad_name       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.ad_name,       tgt.ad_name),
  page_id       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.page_id,       tgt.page_id),
  form_id       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.form_id,       tgt.form_id),
  form_name     = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.form_name,     tgt.form_name),
  platform      = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.platform,      tgt.platform),
  row_updated_at= now();

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

/* Создание индексов */
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_cr_platform_account_campaign 
  ON dashboards.campaign_reference(platform, account_id, campaign_id);

/* GOOGLE */
WITH g_seen AS (
  SELECT
    btrim(gcd.customer_id::text)   AS account_id,
    btrim(gcd.campaign_id::text)   AS campaign_id,
    MIN(gcd.date::date)            AS first_seen_date,
    MAX(gcd.date::date)            AS last_seen_date,
    MIN(NULLIF(btrim(gcd.campaign_name),'')) AS any_campaign_name
  FROM raw.google_ads_campaign_daily gcd
  WHERE gcd.customer_id IS NOT NULL 
    AND gcd.campaign_id IS NOT NULL
    AND gcd.date IS NOT NULL  -- ✅ фильтр NULL дат
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
INSERT INTO dashboards.campaign_reference AS tgt (
  platform, account_id, account_name,
  campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_name_human,
  objective, campaign_status, campaign_effective_status,
  first_seen_date, last_seen_date
)
SELECT
  'google'::text,
  s.account_id,
  'Unknown'::text,
  s.campaign_id,
  COALESCE(s.any_campaign_name,'Unknown'),
  COALESCE(r.campaign_name_human, s.any_campaign_name, 'Unknown'),
  'unknown','unknown','unknown',
  s.first_seen_date, 
  s.last_seen_date
FROM g_seen s
LEFT JOIN dashboards.ref_google_campaign_names r
  ON r.account_id = s.account_id AND r.campaign_id = s.campaign_id
WHERE s.account_id IS NOT NULL 
  AND s.campaign_id IS NOT NULL  -- ✅ финальный фильтр
ON CONFLICT (platform, account_id, campaign_id) DO UPDATE SET
  campaign_name             = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_name, tgt.campaign_name),
  campaign_name_human       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_name_human, tgt.campaign_name_human),
  objective                 = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.objective, tgt.objective),
  campaign_status           = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_status, tgt.campaign_status),
  campaign_effective_status = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_effective_status, tgt.campaign_effective_status),
  first_seen_date           = LEAST(COALESCE(tgt.first_seen_date, EXCLUDED.first_seen_date), EXCLUDED.first_seen_date),
  last_seen_date            = GREATEST(COALESCE(tgt.last_seen_date, EXCLUDED.last_seen_date), EXCLUDED.last_seen_date),
  row_updated_at            = now();

/* META */
WITH s AS (
  SELECT
    btrim(i.campaign_id::text)   AS campaign_id,
    MIN(i.date_start::date)      AS first_seen_date,
    MAX(i.date_start::date)      AS last_seen_date
  FROM raw.fb_ad_insights i
  WHERE i.campaign_id IS NOT NULL
    AND i.date_start IS NOT NULL  -- ✅ фильтр NULL дат
  GROUP BY 1
),
cand AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (btrim(c.campaign_id::text))
    'unknown'::text AS account_id,
    btrim(c.campaign_id::text) AS campaign_id,
    NULLIF(btrim(c.name),'') AS campaign_name,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(btrim(c.objective),''),'unknown')        AS objective,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(btrim(c.status),''),'unknown')           AS status,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(btrim(c.effective_status),''),'unknown') AS effective_status,
    'Unknown'::text AS account_name
  FROM raw.fb_campaigns c
  WHERE c.campaign_id IS NOT NULL  -- ✅ фильтр
  ORDER BY btrim(c.campaign_id::text), c.updated_time DESC NULLS LAST
)
INSERT INTO dashboards.campaign_reference AS tgt (
  platform, account_id, account_name,
  campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_name_human,
  objective, campaign_status, campaign_effective_status,
  first_seen_date, last_seen_date
)
SELECT
  'meta'::text,
  cand.account_id,
  cand.account_name,
  cand.campaign_id,
  COALESCE(cand.campaign_name,'Unknown'),
  COALESCE(r.campaign_name_human, cand.campaign_name, 'Unknown'),
  cand.objective,
  cand.status,
  cand.effective_status,
  s.first_seen_date, 
  s.last_seen_date
FROM cand
LEFT JOIN s ON s.campaign_id = cand.campaign_id
LEFT JOIN dashboards.ref_meta_campaign_names r
  ON r.account_id = cand.account_id AND r.campaign_id = cand.campaign_id
WHERE cand.campaign_id IS NOT NULL  -- ✅ финальный фильтр
ON CONFLICT (platform, account_id, campaign_id) DO UPDATE SET
  campaign_name             = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_name, tgt.campaign_name),
  campaign_name_human       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_name_human, tgt.campaign_name_human),
  objective                 = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.objective, tgt.objective),
  campaign_status           = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_status, tgt.campaign_status),
  campaign_effective_status = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.campaign_effective_status, tgt.campaign_effective_status),
  first_seen_date           = LEAST(COALESCE(tgt.first_seen_date, EXCLUDED.first_seen_date), EXCLUDED.first_seen_date),
  last_seen_date            = GREATEST(COALESCE(tgt.last_seen_date, EXCLUDED.last_seen_date), EXCLUDED.last_seen_date),
  row_updated_at            = now();

COMMIT;

-- ✅ БЕЗОПАСНАЯ ВЕРСИЯ с предварительной валидацией

DO $$
DECLARE
  ir_table_exists boolean;
  ir_id_col text;
  dt_col text;
  sql_text text;
  ALLOWED_COLUMNS text[] := ARRAY['id', 'request_id', 'id_request'];  -- ✅ whitelist
  ALLOWED_DT_COLUMNS text[] := ARRAY['created_date', 'created_at', 'date_create'];
BEGIN
  -- Проверка существования таблицы
  SELECT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables
    WHERE table_schema='raw' AND table_name='itcrm_internet_request'
  ) INTO ir_table_exists;

  IF ir_table_exists THEN
    -- ✅ БЕЗОПАСНО: Проверка через whitelist
    SELECT col INTO ir_id_col
    FROM unnest(ALLOWED_COLUMNS) AS col
    WHERE EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.columns
      WHERE table_schema='raw' 
        AND table_name='itcrm_internet_request' 
        AND column_name=col
    )
    LIMIT 1;

    SELECT col INTO dt_col
    FROM unnest(ALLOWED_DT_COLUMNS) AS col
    WHERE EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.columns
      WHERE table_schema='raw' 
        AND table_name='itcrm_internet_request' 
        AND column_name=col
    )
    LIMIT 1;
  ELSE
    ir_id_col := NULL;
    dt_col := NULL;
  END IF;

  IF ir_id_col IS NULL THEN
    -- Простой INSERT без JOIN
    INSERT INTO dashboards.crm_requests AS tgt (
      id_source, internet_request_id, request_type, form_name, created_date_txt
    )
    SELECT
      irr.id_source::text,
      irr.id_request::text,
      NULL::text,
      NULL::text,
      NULL::text
    FROM raw.itcrm_internet_request_relation irr
    ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
      internet_request_id = EXCLUDED.internet_request_id,
      request_type        = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.request_type,     tgt.request_type),
      form_name           = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.form_name,        tgt.form_name),
      created_date_txt    = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.created_date_txt, tgt.created_date_txt),
      row_updated_at      = now();
  ELSE
    -- ✅ БЕЗОПАСНО: Используем %I для идентификаторов
    sql_text := format($f$
      INSERT INTO dashboards.crm_requests AS tgt (
        id_source, internet_request_id, request_type, form_name, created_date_txt
      )
      SELECT
        irr.id_source::text,
        irr.id_request::text,
        ir.request_type::text,
        ir.form_name::text,
        %s
      FROM raw.itcrm_internet_request_relation irr
      LEFT JOIN raw.itcrm_internet_request ir
        ON ir.%I::text = irr.id_request::text
      ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
        internet_request_id = EXCLUDED.internet_request_id,
        request_type        = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.request_type,     tgt.request_type),
        form_name           = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.form_name,        tgt.form_name),
        created_date_txt    = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.created_date_txt, tgt.created_date_txt),
        row_updated_at      = now();
    $f$,
    CASE WHEN dt_col IS NULL THEN 'NULL::text' ELSE format('ir.%I::text', dt_col) END,
    ir_id_col);

    -- ✅ Добавляем timeout
    SET LOCAL statement_timeout = '60s';
    EXECUTE sql_text;
  END IF;
END $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

BEGIN;

-- ============================================================================
-- DDL: Создать таблицу fact_leads (если не существует)
-- ============================================================================
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dashboards.fact_leads (
  id_source text PRIMARY KEY,

  internet_request_id text,
  request_type        text,
  form_name           text,
  created_date_txt    text,

  utm_source  text,
  utm_medium  text,
  utm_campaign text,
  utm_content text,
  utm_term text,

  dominant_platform text,

  gclid               text,
  google_campaign_id  text,
  google_campaign_name text,
  google_channel_type text,
  google_ad_group_id  text,
  google_ad_group_name text,
  google_keyword_text text,
  google_search_term  text,

  fb_lead_id         text,
  fbclid             text,
  meta_campaign_id   text,
  meta_campaign_name text,
  meta_adset_id      text,
  meta_adset_name    text,
  meta_ad_id         text,
  meta_ad_name       text,
  meta_page_id       text,
  meta_form_id       text,
  meta_form_name     text,
  meta_platform      text,

  unified_campaign_name_google text,
  unified_campaign_name_meta   text,

  is_paid boolean,
  n_paid_ops integer,
  contract_amount numeric(18,2),

  row_created_at timestamptz NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
  row_updated_at timestamptz NOT NULL DEFAULT now()
);

-- Trigger для автоматического обновления row_updated_at
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION dashboards.fn_touch_row_updated()
RETURNS trigger
LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$
BEGIN
  NEW.row_updated_at := now();
  RETURN NEW;
END $$;

DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trg_touch_fact_leads ON dashboards.fact_leads;
CREATE TRIGGER trg_touch_fact_leads
BEFORE UPDATE ON dashboards.fact_leads
FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION dashboards.fn_touch_row_updated();

COMMIT;

-- ============================================================================
-- UPSERT: Загрузить данные из crm_requests + reference tables
-- ============================================================================
BEGIN;

WITH
-- Campaign reference для Google (human-readable names)
cr_g AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (campaign_id)
         platform,
         account_id,
         campaign_id,
         campaign_name_human
  FROM dashboards.campaign_reference
  WHERE platform = 'google'
  ORDER BY campaign_id, last_seen_date DESC NULLS LAST
),
-- Campaign reference для Meta (human-readable names)
cr_m AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (campaign_id)
         platform,
         account_id,
         campaign_id,
         campaign_name_human
  FROM dashboards.campaign_reference
  WHERE platform = 'meta'
  ORDER BY campaign_id, last_seen_date DESC NULLS LAST
),
-- Извлечь tracking параметры из crm_requests.code (JSONB)
extracted_params AS (
  SELECT
    id_source,
    internet_request_id,
    request_type,
    form_name,
    source_date_time::TEXT as created_date_txt,

    -- UTM parameters
    code->>'utm_source' as utm_source,
    code->>'utm_medium' as utm_medium,
    code->>'utm_campaign' as utm_campaign,
    code->>'utm_content' as utm_content,
    code->>'utm_term' as utm_term,

    -- Google parameters
    code->>'gclid' as gclid,
    code->>'campaign_id' as google_campaign_id_raw,
    code->>'campaign_name' as google_campaign_name_raw,

    -- Facebook/Meta parameters
    code->>'fb_lead_id' as fb_lead_id,
    code->>'fbclid' as fbclid,
    code->>'campaign_id' as meta_campaign_id_raw,
    code->>'campaign_name' as meta_campaign_name_raw,
    code->>'adset_id' as meta_adset_id,
    code->>'adset_name' as meta_adset_name,
    code->>'ad_id' as meta_ad_id,
    code->>'ad_name' as meta_ad_name,
    code->>'page_id' as meta_page_id,
    code->>'form_id' as meta_form_id,
    code->>'form_name' as meta_form_name,

    -- Определить dominant_platform
    CASE
      WHEN code->>'gclid' IS NOT NULL AND code->>'gclid' != '' THEN 'google'
      WHEN code->>'fb_lead_id' IS NOT NULL AND code->>'fb_lead_id' != '' THEN 'meta'
      WHEN code->>'fbclid' IS NOT NULL AND code->>'fbclid' != '' THEN 'meta'
      WHEN code->>'utm_source' = 'google' THEN 'google'
      WHEN code->>'utm_source' IN ('facebook', 'instagram', 'meta') THEN 'meta'
      WHEN code->>'utm_source' IS NOT NULL THEN 'other'
      ELSE 'direct'
    END as dominant_platform,

    -- Contract info
    contract_id,
    contract_total as contract_amount

  FROM dashboards.crm_requests
  WHERE source_date_time >= '2025-09-01'  -- Только свежие данные
),
-- Enriched with Google Ads reference data
enriched_google AS (
  SELECT
    ep.*,
    gar.campaign_id as gar_campaign_id,
    gar.campaign_name as gar_campaign_name,
    gar.advertising_channel_type as gar_channel_type,
    gar.ad_group_id as gar_ad_group_id,
    gar.ad_group_name as gar_ad_group_name,
    gar.keyword_text as gar_keyword_text,
    gar.search_term as gar_search_term
  FROM extracted_params ep
  LEFT JOIN dashboards.google_ad_reference gar
    ON gar.gclid = ep.gclid
  WHERE ep.dominant_platform IN ('google', 'direct', 'other')
     OR ep.gclid IS NOT NULL
),
-- Enriched with Facebook Ads reference data
enriched_meta AS (
  SELECT
    eg.*,
    far.campaign_id as far_campaign_id,
    far.campaign_name as far_campaign_name,
    far.adset_id as far_adset_id,
    far.adset_name as far_adset_name,
    far.ad_id as far_ad_id,
    far.ad_name as far_ad_name,
    far.page_id as far_page_id,
    far.form_id as far_form_id,
    far.form_name as far_form_name,
    far.platform as far_platform
  FROM enriched_google eg
  LEFT JOIN dashboards.fb_ad_reference far
    ON (
      (eg.fb_lead_id IS NOT NULL AND eg.fb_lead_id != '' AND far.fb_lead_id = eg.fb_lead_id)
      OR
      (eg.fbclid IS NOT NULL AND eg.fbclid != '' AND far.fbclid = eg.fbclid)
    )
)

-- Final INSERT with all enriched data
INSERT INTO dashboards.fact_leads AS tgt (
  id_source,
  internet_request_id,
  request_type,
  form_name,
  created_date_txt,

  utm_source,
  utm_medium,
  utm_campaign,
  utm_content,
  utm_term,

  dominant_platform,

  gclid,
  google_campaign_id,
  google_campaign_name,
  google_channel_type,
  google_ad_group_id,
  google_ad_group_name,
  google_keyword_text,
  google_search_term,

  fb_lead_id,
  fbclid,
  meta_campaign_id,
  meta_campaign_name,
  meta_adset_id,
  meta_adset_name,
  meta_ad_id,
  meta_ad_name,
  meta_page_id,
  meta_form_id,
  meta_form_name,
  meta_platform,

  unified_campaign_name_google,
  unified_campaign_name_meta,

  is_paid,
  n_paid_ops,
  contract_amount
)
SELECT
  em.id_source,
  em.internet_request_id,
  em.request_type,
  em.form_name,
  em.created_date_txt,

  em.utm_source,
  em.utm_medium,
  em.utm_campaign,
  em.utm_content,
  em.utm_term,

  em.dominant_platform,

  -- Google fields (prioritize extracted, fallback to reference)
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.gclid, ''), NULL) as gclid,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.google_campaign_id_raw, ''), em.gar_campaign_id) as google_campaign_id,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.google_campaign_name_raw, ''), em.gar_campaign_name) as google_campaign_name,
  em.gar_channel_type as google_channel_type,
  em.gar_ad_group_id as google_ad_group_id,
  em.gar_ad_group_name as google_ad_group_name,
  em.gar_keyword_text as google_keyword_text,
  em.gar_search_term as google_search_term,

  -- Meta fields (prioritize extracted, fallback to reference)
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.fb_lead_id, ''), em.far_campaign_id) as fb_lead_id,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.fbclid, ''), NULL) as fbclid,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_campaign_id_raw, ''), em.far_campaign_id) as meta_campaign_id,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_campaign_name_raw, ''), em.far_campaign_name) as meta_campaign_name,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_adset_id, ''), em.far_adset_id) as meta_adset_id,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_adset_name, ''), em.far_adset_name) as meta_adset_name,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_ad_id, ''), em.far_ad_id) as meta_ad_id,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_ad_name, ''), em.far_ad_name) as meta_ad_name,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_page_id, ''), em.far_page_id) as meta_page_id,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_form_id, ''), em.far_form_id) as meta_form_id,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_form_name, ''), em.far_form_name) as meta_form_name,
  em.far_platform as meta_platform,

  -- Human-readable campaign names from campaign_reference
  cg.campaign_name_human as unified_campaign_name_google,
  cm.campaign_name_human as unified_campaign_name_meta,

  -- Payment/Contract info
  CASE
    WHEN em.dominant_platform IN ('google', 'meta', 'other') THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END as is_paid,
  CASE
    WHEN em.dominant_platform IN ('google', 'meta', 'other') THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END as n_paid_ops,
  em.contract_amount

FROM enriched_meta em
LEFT JOIN cr_g cg ON cg.campaign_id = COALESCE(NULLIF(em.google_campaign_id_raw, ''), em.gar_campaign_id)
LEFT JOIN cr_m cm ON cm.campaign_id = COALESCE(NULLIF(em.meta_campaign_id_raw, ''), em.far_campaign_id)

ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
  internet_request_id = EXCLUDED.internet_request_id,
  request_type        = EXCLUDED.request_type,
  form_name           = EXCLUDED.form_name,
  created_date_txt    = EXCLUDED.created_date_txt,

  utm_source          = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_source,   tgt.utm_source),
  utm_medium          = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_medium,   tgt.utm_medium),
  utm_campaign        = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_campaign, tgt.utm_campaign),
  utm_content         = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_content,  tgt.utm_content),
  utm_term            = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_term,     tgt.utm_term),

  dominant_platform   = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.dominant_platform, tgt.dominant_platform),

  gclid               = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.gclid,               tgt.gclid),
  google_campaign_id  = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.google_campaign_id,  tgt.google_campaign_id),
  google_campaign_name= COALESCE(EXCLUDED.google_campaign_name,tgt.google_campaign_name),
  google_channel_type = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.google_channel_type, tgt.google_channel_type),
  google_ad_group_id  = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.google_ad_group_id,  tgt.google_ad_group_id),
  google_ad_group_name= COALESCE(EXCLUDED.google_ad_group_name,tgt.google_ad_group_name),
  google_keyword_text = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.google_keyword_text, tgt.google_keyword_text),
  google_search_term  = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.google_search_term,  tgt.google_search_term),

  fb_lead_id          = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.fb_lead_id,          tgt.fb_lead_id),
  fbclid              = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.fbclid,              tgt.fbclid),
  meta_campaign_id    = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_campaign_id,    tgt.meta_campaign_id),
  meta_campaign_name  = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_campaign_name,  tgt.meta_campaign_name),
  meta_adset_id       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_adset_id,       tgt.meta_adset_id),
  meta_adset_name     = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_adset_name,     tgt.meta_adset_name),
  meta_ad_id          = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_ad_id,          tgt.meta_ad_id),
  meta_ad_name        = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_ad_name,        tgt.meta_ad_name),
  meta_page_id        = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_page_id,        tgt.meta_page_id),
  meta_form_id        = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_form_id,        tgt.meta_form_id),
  meta_form_name      = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_form_name,      tgt.meta_form_name),
  meta_platform       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.meta_platform,       tgt.meta_platform),

  unified_campaign_name_google = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.unified_campaign_name_google, tgt.unified_campaign_name_google),
  unified_campaign_name_meta   = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.unified_campaign_name_meta,   tgt.unified_campaign_name_meta),

  is_paid            = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.is_paid,     tgt.is_paid),
  n_paid_ops         = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.n_paid_ops,  tgt.n_paid_ops),
  contract_amount    = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.contract_amount, tgt.contract_amount),

  row_updated_at     = now();

COMMIT;

-- ============================================================================
-- VERIFICATION QUERIES
-- ============================================================================

-- Check total leads
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_leads FROM dashboards.fact_leads;

-- Check gclid coverage
SELECT
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE gclid IS NOT NULL AND gclid != '') as gclid_count,
  ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE gclid IS NOT NULL AND gclid != '') / COUNT(*), 2) as gclid_percent
FROM dashboards.fact_leads;

-- Check platform distribution
SELECT
  dominant_platform,
  COUNT(*) as leads,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE contract_amount > 0) as contracts,
  SUM(contract_amount) as revenue
FROM dashboards.fact_leads
GROUP BY dominant_platform
ORDER BY leads DESC;

BEGIN;

ALTER TABLE dashboards.fact_leads
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS unified_platform      text,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS unified_campaign_id   text,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS unified_campaign_name text;

WITH
plat AS (
  SELECT
    fl.id_source,
    COALESCE(
      NULLIF(fl.dominant_platform, ''),
      CASE
        -- Google Ads (includes Google CPC)
        WHEN fl.google_campaign_id IS NOT NULL OR NULLIF(fl.gclid,'') IS NOT NULL THEN 'google'
        WHEN cml.utm_source = 'google' AND cml.utm_medium IN ('cpc','ppc') THEN 'google'
        WHEN cml.utm_source ILIKE 'google%' OR cml.utm_source ILIKE '%adwords%' OR cml.utm_source ILIKE '%gads%' THEN 'google'

        -- Meta (Facebook + Instagram)
        WHEN fl.meta_campaign_id IS NOT NULL OR NULLIF(fl.fbclid,'') IS NOT NULL THEN 'meta'
        WHEN fl.fb_lead_id IS NOT NULL AND fl.fb_lead_id != '' THEN 'meta'
        WHEN cml.utm_source ILIKE '%facebook%' OR cml.utm_source ILIKE '%instagram%' OR cml.utm_source ILIKE '%meta%' THEN 'meta'
        WHEN cml.utm_source IN ('fb','ig','meta') THEN 'meta'
        WHEN (lower(cml.utm_medium) IN ('cpc','ppc') AND (cml.utm_source ILIKE '%facebook%' OR cml.utm_source ILIKE '%instagram%' OR cml.utm_source ILIKE '%meta%')) THEN 'meta'

        -- Email
        WHEN lower(cml.utm_source) IN ('email','e-mail','mail','mailchimp','sendpulse') THEN 'email'
        WHEN cml.utm_medium = 'email' THEN 'email'

        -- Telegram
        WHEN cml.utm_source ILIKE '%telegram%' OR cml.utm_source = 'tgchanel' OR cml.utm_source LIKE 'tg_%' THEN 'telegram'

        -- Viber
        WHEN cml.utm_source = 'viber' THEN 'viber'

        -- Direct
        WHEN lower(cml.utm_source) IN ('direct','(direct)','none') OR cml.utm_source IS NULL THEN 'direct'

        -- Paid Other
        WHEN lower(cml.utm_medium) IN ('cpc','ppc','paid') THEN 'paid_other'

        ELSE 'paid_other'
      END
    ) AS unified_platform
  FROM dashboards.fact_leads fl
  LEFT JOIN dashboards.crm_marketing_link cml ON cml.id_source = fl.id_source
),
pref AS (
  SELECT
    fl.id_source,
    p.unified_platform,
    CASE WHEN p.unified_platform='google' THEN NULLIF(fl.google_campaign_id,'')
         WHEN p.unified_platform='meta'   THEN NULLIF(fl.meta_campaign_id,'')
         ELSE NULL END                   AS pref_campaign_id_raw,
    CASE WHEN p.unified_platform='google' THEN NULLIF(fl.google_campaign_name,'')
         WHEN p.unified_platform='meta'   THEN NULLIF(fl.meta_campaign_name,'')
         ELSE NULL END                   AS pref_campaign_name_raw,
    NULLIF(NULLIF(cml.utm_campaign,''), ':')  AS utm_campaign  -- ✅ Исключаем ":"
  FROM dashboards.fact_leads fl
  LEFT JOIN plat p ON p.id_source = fl.id_source
  LEFT JOIN dashboards.crm_marketing_link cml ON cml.id_source = fl.id_source
),
hum AS (
  SELECT
    pr.id_source,
    pr.unified_platform,
    COALESCE(
      cr.campaign_name_human, 
      pr.pref_campaign_name_raw, 
      pr.utm_campaign,
      '(без кампании)'  -- ✅ Fallback по умолчанию
    ) AS best_name,
    COALESCE(pr.pref_campaign_id_raw, pr.utm_campaign) AS best_id
  FROM pref pr
  LEFT JOIN dashboards.campaign_reference cr
    ON cr.platform    = pr.unified_platform
   AND cr.campaign_id = pr.pref_campaign_id_raw
)
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  unified_platform      = h.unified_platform,
  unified_campaign_name = CASE 
                            WHEN h.best_name = ':' THEN '(без кампании)'
                            ELSE h.best_name 
                          END,  -- ✅ Еще одна проверка
  unified_campaign_id   = md5(
                            COALESCE(h.unified_platform,'direct') || '|' ||
                            COALESCE(h.best_id, '(no-id)')
                          ),
  row_updated_at        = now()
FROM hum h
WHERE h.id_source = fl.id_source;

COMMIT;

WITH ranked AS (
  SELECT
    cr.id_source,
    -- UTM параметры
    LOWER(NULLIF(cr.code->>'utm_source', '')) as utm_source,
    LOWER(NULLIF(cr.code->>'utm_medium', '')) as utm_medium,
    NULLIF(cr.code->>'utm_campaign', '') as utm_campaign,
    NULLIF(cr.code->>'utm_content', '') as utm_content,
    NULLIF(cr.code->>'utm_term', '') as utm_term,

    -- Google Click IDs
    NULLIF(cr.code->>'gclid', '') as gclid,
    NULLIF(cr.code->>'gbraid', '') as gbraid,
    NULLIF(cr.code->>'wbraid', '') as wbraid,

    -- Facebook Click IDs (несколько вариантов!)
    NULLIF(cr.code->>'fbclid', '') as fbclid,
    NULLIF(cr.code->>'fclid', '') as fclid,  -- Альтернативное название

    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
      PARTITION BY cr.id_source
      ORDER BY COALESCE(cr.request_created_at, cr.source_date_time) DESC
    ) as rn
  FROM dashboards.crm_requests cr
  WHERE cr.id_source IS NOT NULL
    AND cr.code IS NOT NULL
    AND jsonb_typeof(cr.code) = 'object'
    -- ✅ ВАЖНО: Только последние 30 дней!
    AND COALESCE(cr.request_created_at, cr.source_date_time) >= CURRENT_DATE - 30
)
INSERT INTO dashboards.crm_marketing_link (
  id_source,
  utm_source,
  utm_medium,
  utm_campaign,
  utm_content,
  utm_term,
  gclid,
  fbclid,
  row_created_at,
  row_updated_at
)
SELECT
  id_source,
  utm_source,
  utm_medium,
  utm_campaign,
  utm_content,
  utm_term,
  -- Google Click ID (используем первый непустой)
  COALESCE(gclid, gbraid, wbraid) as gclid,
  -- Facebook Click ID (используем первый непустой)
  COALESCE(fbclid, fclid) as fbclid,
  now(),
  now()
FROM ranked
WHERE rn = 1
ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
  utm_source  = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_source,  crm_marketing_link.utm_source),
  utm_medium  = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_medium,  crm_marketing_link.utm_medium),
  utm_campaign= COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_campaign,crm_marketing_link.utm_campaign),
  utm_content = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_content, crm_marketing_link.utm_content),
  utm_term    = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_term,    crm_marketing_link.utm_term),
  gclid       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.gclid,       crm_marketing_link.gclid),
  fbclid      = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.fbclid,      crm_marketing_link.fbclid),
  row_updated_at = now();

-- Статистика (последние 7 дней)
SELECT
  'crm_marketing_link updated' as status,
  COUNT(*) as total_last_7days,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN gclid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as with_gclid,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN fbclid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as with_fbclid,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN utm_source IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as with_utm
FROM dashboards.crm_marketing_link
WHERE row_updated_at >= CURRENT_DATE - 7;

BEGIN;

UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads AS fl
SET
  google_campaign_id    = COALESCE(fl.google_campaign_id,    gar.campaign_id),
  google_campaign_name  = COALESCE(fl.google_campaign_name,  gar.campaign_name),
  google_channel_type   = COALESCE(fl.google_channel_type,   gar.advertising_channel_type),
  google_ad_group_id    = COALESCE(fl.google_ad_group_id,    gar.ad_group_id),
  google_ad_group_name  = COALESCE(fl.google_ad_group_name,  gar.ad_group_name),
  google_keyword_text   = COALESCE(fl.google_keyword_text,   gar.keyword_text),
  google_search_term    = COALESCE(fl.google_search_term,    gar.search_term),
  row_updated_at        = now()
FROM dashboards.google_ad_reference gar
WHERE gar.gclid = fl.gclid
  AND gar.gclid IS NOT NULL AND gar.gclid <> ''
  AND (
    fl.google_campaign_id   IS NULL OR
    fl.google_campaign_name IS NULL OR
    fl.google_channel_type  IS NULL OR
    fl.google_ad_group_id   IS NULL OR
    fl.google_ad_group_name IS NULL OR
    fl.google_keyword_text  IS NULL OR
    fl.google_search_term   IS NULL
  );

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

/* 2.1 — точный ключ: fb_lead_id */
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads AS fl
SET
  meta_campaign_id   = COALESCE(fl.meta_campaign_id,   far.campaign_id),
  meta_campaign_name = COALESCE(fl.meta_campaign_name, far.campaign_name),
  meta_adset_id      = COALESCE(fl.meta_adset_id,      far.adset_id),
  meta_adset_name    = COALESCE(fl.meta_adset_name,    far.adset_name),
  meta_ad_id         = COALESCE(fl.meta_ad_id,         far.ad_id),
  meta_ad_name       = COALESCE(fl.meta_ad_name,       far.ad_name),
  meta_page_id       = COALESCE(fl.meta_page_id,       far.page_id),
  meta_form_id       = COALESCE(fl.meta_form_id,       far.form_id),
  meta_form_name     = COALESCE(fl.meta_form_name,     far.form_name),
  meta_platform      = COALESCE(fl.meta_platform,      far.platform),
  row_updated_at     = now()
FROM dashboards.fb_ad_reference far
WHERE fl.fb_lead_id IS NOT NULL AND fl.fb_lead_id <> ''
  AND far.fb_lead_id = fl.fb_lead_id
  AND (
    fl.meta_campaign_id   IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_campaign_name IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_adset_id      IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_adset_name    IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_ad_id         IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_ad_name       IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_page_id       IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_form_id       IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_form_name     IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_platform      IS NULL
  );

/* 2.2 — добивка по fbclid */
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads AS fl
SET
  meta_campaign_id   = COALESCE(fl.meta_campaign_id,   far.campaign_id),
  meta_campaign_name = COALESCE(fl.meta_campaign_name, far.campaign_name),
  meta_adset_id      = COALESCE(fl.meta_adset_id,      far.adset_id),
  meta_adset_name    = COALESCE(fl.meta_adset_name,    far.adset_name),
  meta_ad_id         = COALESCE(fl.meta_ad_id,         far.ad_id),
  meta_ad_name       = COALESCE(fl.meta_ad_name,       far.ad_name),
  meta_page_id       = COALESCE(fl.meta_page_id,       far.page_id),
  meta_form_id       = COALESCE(fl.meta_form_id,       far.form_id),
  meta_form_name     = COALESCE(fl.meta_form_name,     far.form_name),
  meta_platform      = COALESCE(fl.meta_platform,      far.platform),
  row_updated_at     = now()
FROM dashboards.fb_ad_reference far
WHERE (fl.fb_lead_id IS NULL OR fl.fb_lead_id = '')
  AND fl.fbclid IS NOT NULL AND fl.fbclid <> ''
  AND far.fbclid = fl.fbclid
  AND (
    fl.meta_campaign_id   IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_campaign_name IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_adset_id      IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_adset_name    IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_ad_id         IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_ad_name       IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_page_id       IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_form_id       IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_form_name     IS NULL OR
    fl.meta_platform      IS NULL
  );

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

/* индексы на ключи, если ещё нет */
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS ux_cml_id_source ON dashboards.crm_marketing_link(id_source);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_cml_gclid  ON dashboards.crm_marketing_link (gclid);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_cml_fbclid ON dashboards.crm_marketing_link (fbclid);

/* извлечём параметры из последнего code */
WITH src AS (
  SELECT
    cr.id_source,
    CASE
      WHEN cr.code IS NULL THEN NULL
      WHEN jsonb_typeof(cr.code)='string' THEN cr.code #>> '{}'
      ELSE cr.code::text
    END AS code_text
  FROM dashboards.crm_requests cr
  WHERE cr.id_source IS NOT NULL
),
ext AS (
  SELECT
    id_source,
    lower(NULLIF(substring(code_text FROM '(?i)utm_source[=:\"?&]+([^\"&\\s]+)'),  '')) AS utm_source,
    lower(NULLIF(substring(code_text FROM '(?i)utm_medium[=:\"?&]+([^\"&\\s]+)'),  '')) AS utm_medium,
    NULLIF(substring(code_text     FROM '(?i)utm_campaign[=:\"?&]+([^\"&\\s]+)'), '')   AS utm_campaign,
    NULLIF(substring(code_text     FROM '(?i)utm_content[=:\"?&]+([^\"&\\s]+)'),  '')   AS utm_content,
    NULLIF(substring(code_text     FROM '(?i)utm_term[=:\"?&]+([^\"&\\s]+)'),     '')   AS utm_term,
    NULLIF(substring(code_text     FROM '(?i)gclid[=:\"?&]+([A-Za-z0-9._-]+)'), '')   AS gclid,
    NULLIF(substring(code_text     FROM '(?i)gbraid[=:\"?&]+([A-Za-z0-9._-]+)'), '')  AS gbraid,
    NULLIF(substring(code_text     FROM '(?i)wbraid[=:\"?&]+([A-Za-z0-9._-]+)'), '')  AS wbraid,
    NULLIF(substring(code_text     FROM '(?i)fbclid[=:\"?&]+([A-Za-z0-9._-]+)'), '')  AS fbclid
  FROM src
)
INSERT INTO dashboards.crm_marketing_link AS tgt
  (id_source, utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign, utm_content, utm_term, gclid, fbclid)
SELECT
  e.id_source,
  e.utm_source, e.utm_medium, e.utm_campaign, e.utm_content, e.utm_term,
  COALESCE(e.gclid, e.gbraid, e.wbraid) AS gclid,   -- любой google-маркер в gclid
  e.fbclid
FROM ext e
WHERE e.id_source IS NOT NULL
ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
  utm_source  = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_source,  tgt.utm_source),
  utm_medium  = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_medium,  tgt.utm_medium),
  utm_campaign= COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_campaign,tgt.utm_campaign),
  utm_content = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_content, tgt.utm_content),
  utm_term    = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.utm_term,    tgt.utm_term),
  gclid       = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.gclid,       tgt.gclid),
  fbclid      = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.fbclid,      tgt.fbclid),
  row_updated_at = now();

COMMIT;

-- Безопасно убрать конфликтующий объект (TABLE/MATERIALIZED VIEW), если он есть
DO $$
BEGIN
  IF EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pg_class c
    JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
    WHERE n.nspname='dashboards' AND c.relname='v6_google_contracts_detail' AND c.relkind='m'  -- matview
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE 'DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW dashboards.v6_google_contracts_detail';
  ELSIF EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pg_class c
    JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
    WHERE n.nspname='dashboards' AND c.relname='v6_google_contracts_detail' AND c.relkind='r'  -- table
  ) THEN
    EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE dashboards.v6_google_contracts_detail';
  END IF;
END $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

-- Создать/переопределить VIEW
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW dashboards.v6_google_contracts_detail AS
WITH dc_pick AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (dc.contract_id)
    dc.contract_id::bigint                               AS contract_id,
    COALESCE(dc.updated_at, dc.created_at)::date         AS contract_dt
  FROM raw.itcrm_docs_clients dc
  WHERE dc.contract_id IS NOT NULL
  ORDER BY dc.contract_id, COALESCE(dc.updated_at, dc.created_at) DESC NULLS LAST
)
SELECT
  'google'::text                           AS platform_detected,
  cr.contract_id::bigint                   AS contract_id,
  cr.contract_total::numeric               AS contract_amount,
  dp.contract_dt                           AS contract_dt,
  cr.id_source::text                       AS id_source,
  cr.internet_request_id                   AS internet_request_id,

  -- META поля оставляем нулями/как есть для унификации структуры (могут быть NULL)
  fl.meta_platform,
  fl.meta_campaign_id,
  fl.meta_adset_id,
  fl.meta_ad_id,
  fl.fb_lead_id,
  fl.fbclid,

  -- GOOGLE источник договора
  fl.gclid,
  fl.google_campaign_id,
  fl.google_campaign_name,
  fl.google_ad_group_id,
  fl.google_ad_group_name,
  fl.google_keyword_text,
  fl.google_search_term,

  -- UTM
  fl.utm_source,
  fl.utm_medium,
  fl.utm_campaign,
  fl.utm_content,
  fl.utm_term
FROM dashboards.crm_requests cr
LEFT JOIN dc_pick dp ON dp.contract_id = cr.contract_id
LEFT JOIN dashboards.fact_leads fl ON fl.id_source = cr.id_source
WHERE (fl.google_campaign_id IS NOT NULL OR NULLIF(fl.gclid,'') IS NOT NULL);

BEGIN;

INSERT INTO dashboards.lead_marketing_enriched AS tgt (
  id_source,
  internet_request_id,
  request_type,
  form_name,
  created_date_txt,
  dominant_platform
)
SELECT DISTINCT
  cr.id_source,
  cr.internet_request_id,
  cr.request_type,
  cr.form_name,
  COALESCE(cr.request_created_at, cr.source_date_time)::text AS created_date_txt,

  -- ✅ ИСПРАВЛЕНО: Правильная классификация платформ
  CASE
    -- Google Ads (includes Google CPC)
    WHEN cr.code->>'gclid' IS NOT NULL AND cr.code->>'gclid' != ''
      THEN 'google'
    WHEN cr.code->>'utm_source' = 'google'
         AND cr.code->>'utm_medium' IN ('cpc', 'ppc')
      THEN 'google'
    WHEN LOWER(cr.code->>'utm_source') LIKE '%google%'
      THEN 'google'

    -- Meta (Facebook + Instagram)
    WHEN cr.code->>'fbclid' IS NOT NULL AND cr.code->>'fbclid' != ''
      THEN 'meta'
    WHEN cr.code->>'fb_lead_id' IS NOT NULL AND cr.code->>'fb_lead_id' != ''
      THEN 'meta'
    WHEN LOWER(cr.code->>'utm_source') LIKE '%facebook%'
      THEN 'meta'
    WHEN LOWER(cr.code->>'utm_source') LIKE '%instagram%'
      THEN 'meta'
    WHEN cr.code->>'utm_source' IN ('fb', 'ig', 'meta')
      THEN 'meta'

    -- Email
    WHEN LOWER(cr.code->>'utm_source') LIKE '%email%'
      THEN 'email'
    WHEN cr.code->>'utm_source' = 'sendpulse'
      THEN 'email'
    WHEN cr.code->>'utm_medium' = 'email'
      THEN 'email'

    -- Telegram
    WHEN LOWER(cr.code->>'utm_source') LIKE '%telegram%'
      THEN 'telegram'
    WHEN cr.code->>'utm_source' LIKE 'tg_%'
      THEN 'telegram'
    WHEN cr.code->>'utm_source' = 'tgchanel'
      THEN 'telegram'

    -- Viber
    WHEN cr.code->>'utm_source' = 'viber'
      THEN 'viber'

    -- Paid Other (has UTM but not identified)
    WHEN cr.code->>'utm_source' IS NOT NULL
         AND cr.code->>'utm_source' != ''
      THEN 'paid_other'

    -- Direct (no UTM at all)
    ELSE 'direct'
  END AS dominant_platform

FROM dashboards.crm_requests cr
WHERE cr.id_source IS NOT NULL
  AND COALESCE(cr.request_created_at, cr.source_date_time) >= CURRENT_DATE - 30
ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
  internet_request_id = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.internet_request_id, tgt.internet_request_id),
  request_type        = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.request_type, tgt.request_type),
  form_name           = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.form_name, tgt.form_name),
  created_date_txt    = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.created_date_txt, tgt.created_date_txt),
  dominant_platform   = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.dominant_platform, tgt.dominant_platform),
  row_updated_at      = now();

SELECT
  'lead_marketing_enriched' as table_name,
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN created_date_txt::date >= CURRENT_DATE - 7 THEN 1 END) as last_7_days,
  MAX(created_date_txt::date) as latest_date
FROM dashboards.lead_marketing_enriched;

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- Обновление агрегации оплат
INSERT INTO dashboards.crm_payment_summary AS tgt (
  id_source, 
  is_paid, 
  n_paid_ops, 
  n_reissuance, 
  n_failed,
  first_payment_date, 
  last_payment_date
)
SELECT
  np.id_source::text,
  BOOL_OR(np.payment = 1) AS is_paid,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE np.payment = 1) AS n_paid_ops,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE np.reissuance = 1) AS n_reissuance,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE np.date_fail IS NOT NULL) AS n_failed,
  MIN(np.date_payment) AS first_payment_date,
  MAX(np.date_payment) AS last_payment_date
FROM raw.itcrm_new_payment np
WHERE np.id_source IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY np.id_source
ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
  is_paid = EXCLUDED.is_paid,
  n_paid_ops = EXCLUDED.n_paid_ops,
  n_reissuance = EXCLUDED.n_reissuance,
  n_failed = EXCLUDED.n_failed,
  first_payment_date = LEAST(
    COALESCE(tgt.first_payment_date, EXCLUDED.first_payment_date), 
    EXCLUDED.first_payment_date
  ),
  last_payment_date = GREATEST(
    COALESCE(tgt.last_payment_date, EXCLUDED.last_payment_date), 
    EXCLUDED.last_payment_date
  ),
  row_updated_at = now();

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- Обновление агрегации договоров
INSERT INTO dashboards.crm_contract_summary AS tgt (
  id_source, 
  contract_amount, 
  n_contracts, 
  first_contract_date, 
  last_contract_date
)
SELECT
  dc.id_source::text,
  SUM(COALESCE(dc.total_cost_of_the_contract, dc.sum2, 0))::numeric(18,2) AS contract_amount,
  COUNT(*) AS n_contracts,
  MIN(COALESCE(dc.created_at, dc.updated_at)::date) AS first_contract_date,
  MAX(COALESCE(dc.updated_at, dc.created_at)::date) AS last_contract_date
FROM raw.itcrm_docs_clients dc
WHERE dc.id_source IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY dc.id_source
ON CONFLICT (id_source) DO UPDATE SET
  contract_amount = EXCLUDED.contract_amount,
  n_contracts = EXCLUDED.n_contracts,
  first_contract_date = LEAST(
    COALESCE(tgt.first_contract_date, EXCLUDED.first_contract_date), 
    EXCLUDED.first_contract_date
  ),
  last_contract_date = GREATEST(
    COALESCE(tgt.last_contract_date, EXCLUDED.last_contract_date), 
    EXCLUDED.last_contract_date
  ),
  row_updated_at = now();

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- Обогащение lead_marketing_enriched из utm_campaign для Meta
WITH utm_meta AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    cml.id_source,
    cml.utm_campaign,
    cml.utm_source,
    cml.utm_content
  FROM dashboards.crm_marketing_link cml
  WHERE (cml.utm_source ILIKE '%facebook%' 
         OR cml.utm_source ILIKE '%instagram%'
         OR cml.utm_source ILIKE '%meta%')
    AND cml.utm_campaign IS NOT NULL
    AND cml.utm_campaign <> ''
    AND cml.utm_campaign <> ':'  -- ✅ Исключаем некорректные значения
    AND cml.fbclid IS NULL  -- только те, где нет маркера
),
campaign_match AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (utm.id_source)
    utm.id_source,
    fc.campaign_id,
    fc.name as campaign_name
  FROM utm_meta utm
  JOIN raw.fb_campaigns fc 
    ON (
      fc.name = utm.utm_campaign
      OR fc.name ILIKE '%' || utm.utm_campaign || '%'
      OR utm.utm_campaign ILIKE '%' || fc.name || '%'
    )
  ORDER BY utm.id_source, 
           CASE 
             WHEN fc.name = utm.utm_campaign THEN 1  -- точное совпадение важнее
             ELSE 2 
           END
)

UPDATE dashboards.lead_marketing_enriched lme
SET 
  meta_campaign_id = cm.campaign_id,
  meta_campaign_name = cm.campaign_name,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM campaign_match cm
WHERE cm.id_source = lme.id_source
  AND (lme.meta_campaign_id IS NULL OR lme.meta_campaign_id = '');

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- Обновление unified_campaign_name из utm_campaign для записей без названия
WITH utm_fixes AS (
  SELECT 
    fl.id_source,
    cml.utm_campaign,
    cml.utm_source,
    cml.utm_medium
  FROM dashboards.fact_leads fl
  JOIN dashboards.crm_marketing_link cml ON cml.id_source = fl.id_source
  WHERE (fl.unified_campaign_name = '(без кампании)' 
         OR fl.unified_campaign_name IS NULL
         OR btrim(fl.unified_campaign_name) = '')
    AND cml.utm_campaign IS NOT NULL
    AND btrim(cml.utm_campaign) <> ''
    AND cml.utm_campaign <> ':'
)
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  unified_campaign_name = uf.utm_campaign,
  unified_campaign_id = md5(
    COALESCE(fl.unified_platform, 'unknown') || '|' || uf.utm_campaign
  ),
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM utm_fixes uf
WHERE uf.id_source = fl.id_source;

-- Статистика
DO $$
DECLARE
  updated_count int;
BEGIN
  GET DIAGNOSTICS updated_count = ROW_COUNT;
  RAISE NOTICE '✅ Updated % records with utm_campaign fallback', updated_count;
END $$;

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- ===============================================
-- 1. ОЧИСТКА НЕКОРРЕКТНЫХ GCLID
-- ===============================================

-- Обнуляем известные некорректные значения
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads
SET 
  gclid = NULL,
  row_updated_at = now()
WHERE gclid IN ('gsession', 'null', '', '(none)', 'undefined')
   OR length(gclid) < 10  -- валидный gclid минимум 10 символов
   OR gclid ~ '[^A-Za-z0-9._-]';  -- только допустимые символы

-- ===============================================
-- 2. БЭКФИЛ КОРРЕКТНЫХ GCLID ИЗ CRM_MARKETING_LINK
-- ===============================================

UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET 
  gclid = cml.gclid,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM dashboards.crm_marketing_link cml
WHERE cml.id_source = fl.id_source
  AND (fl.gclid IS NULL OR fl.gclid = '')
  AND cml.gclid IS NOT NULL
  AND cml.gclid <> ''
  AND length(cml.gclid) >= 10
  AND fl.unified_platform = 'google';

-- ===============================================
-- 3. ОБНОВЛЕНИЕ GOOGLE CAMPAIGN NAME ИЗ REFERENCE
-- ===============================================

UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET 
  google_campaign_id = gar.campaign_id,
  google_campaign_name = gar.campaign_name,
  google_channel_type = gar.advertising_channel_type,
  google_ad_group_id = gar.ad_group_id,
  google_ad_group_name = gar.ad_group_name,
  google_keyword_text = gar.keyword_text,
  google_search_term = gar.search_term,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM dashboards.google_ad_reference gar
WHERE gar.gclid = fl.gclid
  AND fl.gclid IS NOT NULL
  AND fl.gclid <> ''
  AND fl.unified_platform = 'google'
  AND (fl.google_campaign_name IS NULL OR fl.google_campaign_name = '');

-- Статистика
DO $$
DECLARE
  cleaned int;
  backfilled int;
  enriched int;
BEGIN
  RAISE NOTICE '========================================';
  RAISE NOTICE '✅ GCLID CLEANUP & BACKFILL COMPLETED';
  RAISE NOTICE '========================================';
END $$;

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- ===============================================
-- UTM ФОЛБЭК ДЛЯ GOOGLE ЛИДОВ БЕЗ GCLID
-- ===============================================

WITH google_utm AS (
  SELECT 
    fl.id_source,
    cml.utm_campaign,
    cml.utm_source,
    cml.utm_medium
  FROM dashboards.fact_leads fl
  JOIN dashboards.crm_marketing_link cml ON cml.id_source = fl.id_source
  WHERE fl.unified_platform = 'google'
    AND (fl.google_campaign_name IS NULL OR fl.google_campaign_name = '')
    AND cml.utm_campaign IS NOT NULL
    AND btrim(cml.utm_campaign) <> ''
    AND cml.utm_campaign <> ':'
)
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  google_campaign_name = gu.utm_campaign,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM google_utm gu
WHERE gu.id_source = fl.id_source;

-- ===============================================
-- ОБНОВЛЕНИЕ UNIFIED ПОЛЕЙ
-- ===============================================

UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads
SET
  unified_campaign_name = google_campaign_name,
  unified_campaign_id = md5('google|' || COALESCE(google_campaign_id, google_campaign_name)),
  row_updated_at = now()
WHERE unified_platform = 'google'
  AND google_campaign_name IS NOT NULL
  AND google_campaign_name <> ''
  AND (unified_campaign_name = '(без кампании)' OR unified_campaign_name IS NULL);

-- Статистика
DO $$
DECLARE
  updated_count int;
BEGIN
  SELECT COUNT(*) INTO updated_count
  FROM dashboards.fact_leads
  WHERE unified_platform = 'google'
    AND unified_campaign_name <> '(без кампании)';
    
  RAISE NOTICE '========================================';
  RAISE NOTICE '✅ GOOGLE UTM FALLBACK COMPLETED';
  RAISE NOTICE '📊 Total Google leads with campaign: %', updated_count;
  RAISE NOTICE '========================================';
END $$;

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- 1. Обновить UTM и платформу
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  utm_source = cml.utm_source,
  utm_medium = cml.utm_medium,
  utm_campaign = cml.utm_campaign,
  utm_content = cml.utm_content,
  utm_term = cml.utm_term,
  gclid = cml.gclid,
  fbclid = cml.fbclid,
  dominant_platform = CASE
    -- Google Ads (includes Google CPC)
    WHEN cml.gclid IS NOT NULL AND cml.gclid != '' THEN 'google'
    WHEN fl.google_campaign_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'google'
    WHEN cml.utm_source = 'google' AND cml.utm_medium IN ('cpc', 'ppc') THEN 'google'
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) LIKE '%google%' THEN 'google'

    -- Meta (Facebook + Instagram)
    WHEN cml.fbclid IS NOT NULL AND cml.fbclid != '' THEN 'meta'
    WHEN fl.fb_lead_id IS NOT NULL AND fl.fb_lead_id != '' THEN 'meta'
    WHEN fl.meta_campaign_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'meta'
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) LIKE '%facebook%' THEN 'meta'
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) LIKE '%instagram%' THEN 'meta'
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) LIKE '%meta%' THEN 'meta'
    WHEN cml.utm_source IN ('facebook', 'fb', 'ig', 'meta') THEN 'meta'

    -- Email
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) LIKE '%email%' THEN 'email'
    WHEN cml.utm_source IN ('email', 'mail', 'sendpulse') THEN 'email'
    WHEN cml.utm_medium = 'email' THEN 'email'

    -- Telegram
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) LIKE '%telegram%' THEN 'telegram'
    WHEN cml.utm_source LIKE 'tg_%' THEN 'telegram'
    WHEN cml.utm_source = 'tgchanel' THEN 'telegram'

    -- Viber
    WHEN cml.utm_source = 'viber' THEN 'viber'

    -- YouTube
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) LIKE '%youtube%' THEN 'youtube'

    -- TikTok
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) LIKE '%tiktok%' THEN 'tiktok'

    -- Direct
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_source) IN ('direct', '(direct)', '(none)') OR cml.utm_source IS NULL THEN 'direct'

    -- Organic
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_medium) = 'organic' THEN 'organic'

    -- Referral
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_medium) IN ('referral', 'refer') THEN 'referral'

    -- Paid Other (has UTM but not identified)
    WHEN LOWER(cml.utm_medium) IN ('cpc', 'ppc', 'paid') THEN 'paid_other'
    WHEN cml.utm_source IS NOT NULL AND cml.utm_source <> '' THEN 'paid_other'

    ELSE 'direct'
  END,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM dashboards.crm_marketing_link cml
WHERE fl.id_source = cml.id_source
  AND fl.created_date_txt::date >= CURRENT_DATE - 30;

-- 2. Заполнить Google Campaign ID через gclid
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  google_campaign_id = gc.campaign_id::text,
  google_ad_group_id = gc.ad_group_id::text,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM dashboards.crm_marketing_link cml
JOIN raw.google_ads_clicks gc ON gc.gclid = cml.gclid
WHERE fl.id_source = cml.id_source
  AND cml.gclid IS NOT NULL
  AND fl.google_campaign_id IS NULL;

-- 3. Google keyword attribution
WITH keyword_attribution AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (fl.id_source)
    fl.id_source,
    gk.ad_group_id,
    gk.ad_group_criterion_id,
    gk.keyword_text,
    gk.keyword_match_type
  FROM dashboards.fact_leads fl
  JOIN raw.google_ads_keyword_daily gk
    ON gk.campaign_id = fl.google_campaign_id::bigint
    AND gk.date = fl.created_date_txt::date
  WHERE fl.dominant_platform = 'google'
    AND fl.google_campaign_id IS NOT NULL
    AND fl.google_keyword_text IS NULL
  ORDER BY fl.id_source, gk.clicks DESC, gk.cost_micros DESC
)
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  google_ad_group_id = ka.ad_group_id::text,
  google_ad_group_criterion_id = ka.ad_group_criterion_id,
  google_keyword_text = ka.keyword_text,
  google_keyword_match_type = ka.keyword_match_type,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM keyword_attribution ka
WHERE fl.id_source = ka.id_source;

-- 4. Google ad attribution
WITH ad_attribution AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (fl.id_source)
    fl.id_source,
    ga.ad_id
  FROM dashboards.fact_leads fl
  JOIN raw.google_ads_ad_daily ga
    ON ga.campaign_id = fl.google_campaign_id::bigint
    AND ga.date = fl.created_date_txt::date
  WHERE fl.dominant_platform = 'google'
    AND fl.google_campaign_id IS NOT NULL
    AND fl.google_ad_id IS NULL
  ORDER BY fl.id_source, ga.clicks DESC
)
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  google_ad_id = aa.ad_id,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM ad_attribution aa
WHERE fl.id_source = aa.id_source;

-- 5. Meta attribution from fb_leads (только по email)
-- ✅ УПРОЩЕНО: JOIN только по email (телефонов нет в crm_requests)
WITH fb_leads_match AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    cr.id_source,
    fbl.campaign_id,
    fbl.adset_id,
    fbl.ad_id
  FROM raw.fb_leads fbl
  JOIN dashboards.crm_requests cr
    ON fbl.email IS NOT NULL
    AND fbl.email <> ''
    AND cr.email IS NOT NULL
    AND cr.email <> ''
    AND LOWER(TRIM(cr.email)) = LOWER(TRIM(fbl.email))
  WHERE fbl.request_created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - 30
)
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  meta_campaign_id = flm.campaign_id,
  meta_adset_id = flm.adset_id,
  meta_ad_id = flm.ad_id,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM fb_leads_match flm
WHERE fl.id_source = flm.id_source;

-- 6. Meta creative
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  meta_creative_id = fa.ad_creative_id,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM raw.fb_ads fa
WHERE fl.meta_ad_id = fa.ad_id
  AND fl.meta_creative_id IS NULL;

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- Telegram
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads
SET
  telegram_source = utm_content,
  row_updated_at = now()
WHERE dominant_platform = 'telegram'
  AND utm_content IS NOT NULL
  AND telegram_source IS NULL;

-- TikTok
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads
SET
  tiktok_campaign_id = utm_campaign,
  row_updated_at = now()
WHERE dominant_platform = 'tiktok'
  AND utm_campaign IS NOT NULL
  AND tiktok_campaign_id IS NULL;

-- Email
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads
SET
  email_campaign_id = utm_campaign,
  row_updated_at = now()
WHERE dominant_platform = 'email'
  AND utm_campaign IS NOT NULL
  AND email_campaign_id IS NULL;

COMMIT;

BEGIN;

-- 1. Заполнить Meta attribution через fb_lead_id
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  meta_campaign_id = fbl.campaign_id,
  meta_adset_id = fbl.adset_id,
  meta_ad_id = fbl.ad_id,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM raw.fb_leads fbl
WHERE fl.fb_lead_id = fbl.fb_lead_id
  AND fl.fb_lead_id IS NOT NULL
  AND fbl.fb_lead_id IS NOT NULL
  AND fl.created_date_txt::date >= CURRENT_DATE - 30
  AND fl.meta_campaign_id IS NULL;

-- 2. Заполнить Meta creative ID
UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  meta_creative_id = fa.ad_creative_id,
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM raw.fb_ads fa
WHERE fl.meta_ad_id = fa.ad_id
  AND fl.meta_creative_id IS NULL
  AND fl.created_date_txt::date >= CURRENT_DATE - 30;

COMMIT;

UPDATE dashboards.fact_leads fl
SET
  fb_lead_id = cr.code->>'fb_lead_id',
  event_id = cr.code->>'event_id',
  row_updated_at = now()
FROM dashboards.crm_requests cr
WHERE fl.id_source = cr.id_source
  AND fl.created_date_txt::date >= CURRENT_DATE - 30
  AND (
    (cr.code->>'fb_lead_id' IS NOT NULL AND cr.code->>'fb_lead_id' <> '' AND fl.fb_lead_id IS NULL)
    OR
    (cr.code->>'event_id' IS NOT NULL AND cr.code->>'event_id' <> '' AND fl.event_id IS NULL)
  );

INSERT INTO dashboards.stg_google_clicks (
  gclid, click_timestamp,
  page_url, page_path, page_title,
  utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign, utm_term, utm_content,
  extracted_campaign_id, extracted_ad_id
)
SELECT DISTINCT
  gclid,
  date::TIMESTAMP as click_timestamp,
  NULL as page_url,
  NULL as page_path,
  NULL as page_title,
  NULL as utm_source,
  NULL as utm_medium,
  NULL as utm_campaign,
  NULL as utm_term,
  NULL as utm_content,
  campaign_id::TEXT as extracted_campaign_id,
  ad_group_id::TEXT as extracted_ad_id

FROM raw.google_ads_clicks

WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '90 days'
  AND gclid IS NOT NULL
  AND gclid != ''
  AND load_timestamp > COALESCE(
    (SELECT MAX(load_timestamp) FROM dashboards.stg_google_clicks),
    '1970-01-01'::TIMESTAMP
  )

ON CONFLICT (gclid, click_timestamp) DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO dashboards.dim_creative (
  ad_creative_id, media_type, media_image_src, thumbnail_url,
  video_id, title, body, description, call_to_action,
  link_url, permalink_url, last_updated_at
)
SELECT DISTINCT
  ad_creative_id,
  CASE
    WHEN video_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'video'
    WHEN media_image_src IS NOT NULL THEN 'image'
    ELSE 'unknown'
  END as media_type,
  media_image_src,
  thumbnail_url,
  video_id,
  title,
  body,
  description,
  cta_type as call_to_action,
  link_url,
  permalink_url,
  NOW() as last_updated_at
FROM raw.fb_ad_creative_details
WHERE ad_creative_id IS NOT NULL

ON CONFLICT (ad_creative_id) DO UPDATE SET
  media_type = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.media_type, dim_creative.media_type),
  media_image_src = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.media_image_src, dim_creative.media_image_src),
  thumbnail_url = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.thumbnail_url, dim_creative.thumbnail_url),
  video_id = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.video_id, dim_creative.video_id),
  title = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.title, dim_creative.title),
  body = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.body, dim_creative.body),
  description = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.description, dim_creative.description),
  call_to_action = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.call_to_action, dim_creative.call_to_action),
  link_url = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.link_url, dim_creative.link_url),
  permalink_url = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.permalink_url, dim_creative.permalink_url),
  last_updated_at = NOW();

INSERT INTO dashboards.stg_crm_requests (
  source_id, analytic_id, internet_request_id,
  phone, email, request_created_at,
  code_variant,
  utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign, utm_term, utm_content,
  fb_lead_id, fclid, fb_event_id,
  gclid, ga_client_id,
  ga_session_id, ga_session_number, ga_session_timestamp,
  extracted_ad_id, extracted_campaign_id,
  raw_code
)
SELECT
  id as source_id,
  analytic_id,
  internet_request_id,
  phone,
  email,
  request_created_at,

  CASE
    WHEN code IS NULL THEN 'null'
    WHEN jsonb_typeof(code) = 'string' THEN 'string'
    WHEN code ? 'ga' AND code ? 'gsession' THEN 'google_analytics'
    WHEN code ? 'fb_lead_id' OR code ? 'fclid' THEN 'facebook_lead'
    WHEN code ? 'utm_source' THEN 'utm_params'
    ELSE 'unknown'
  END as code_variant,

  code->>'utm_source' as utm_source,
  code->>'utm_medium' as utm_medium,
  code->>'utm_campaign' as utm_campaign,
  code->>'utm_term' as utm_term,
  code->>'utm_content' as utm_content,

  code->>'fb_lead_id' as fb_lead_id,
  NULLIF(code->>'fclid', '') as fclid,
  code->>'event_id' as fb_event_id,

  gclid,
  code->>'ga' as ga_client_id,

  CASE
    WHEN code ? 'gsession' AND jsonb_typeof(code->'gsession') = 'object' THEN (
      SELECT key
      FROM jsonb_each(code->'gsession')
      LIMIT 1
    )
    ELSE NULL
  END as ga_session_id,

  CASE
    WHEN code ? 'gsession' AND jsonb_typeof(code->'gsession') = 'object' THEN (
      SELECT NULLIF(
        regexp_replace(
          SPLIT_PART(SPLIT_PART(value::TEXT, '$o', 2), '$', 1),
          '[^0-9]', '', 'g'
        ),
        ''
      )::INTEGER
      FROM jsonb_each(code->'gsession')
      WHERE value::TEXT LIKE '%$o%'
      LIMIT 1
    )
    ELSE NULL
  END as ga_session_number,

  CASE
    WHEN code ? 'gsession' AND jsonb_typeof(code->'gsession') = 'object' THEN (
      SELECT NULLIF(
        regexp_replace(
          SPLIT_PART(SPLIT_PART(value::TEXT, '$t', 2), '$', 1),
          '[^0-9]', '', 'g'
        ),
        ''
      )::BIGINT
      FROM jsonb_each(code->'gsession')
      WHERE value::TEXT LIKE '%$t%'
      LIMIT 1
    )
    ELSE NULL
  END as ga_session_timestamp,

  CASE
    WHEN code->>'utm_term' ~ '^\d{15,20}$' THEN code->>'utm_term'
    ELSE NULL
  END as extracted_ad_id,

  CASE
    WHEN code->>'utm_campaign' ~ '^\d{10,20}$' THEN code->>'utm_campaign'
    ELSE NULL
  END as extracted_campaign_id,

  code as raw_code

FROM raw.itcrm_analytics

WHERE load_timestamp > COALESCE(
  (SELECT MAX(load_timestamp) FROM dashboards.stg_crm_requests),
  '1970-01-01'::TIMESTAMP
)

ON CONFLICT (source_id) DO UPDATE SET
  phone = EXCLUDED.phone,
  email = EXCLUDED.email,
  code_variant = EXCLUDED.code_variant,
  utm_source = EXCLUDED.utm_source,
  utm_medium = EXCLUDED.utm_medium,
  utm_campaign = EXCLUDED.utm_campaign,
  utm_term = EXCLUDED.utm_term,
  utm_content = EXCLUDED.utm_content,
  fb_lead_id = EXCLUDED.fb_lead_id,
  fclid = EXCLUDED.fclid,
  fb_event_id = EXCLUDED.fb_event_id,
  gclid = EXCLUDED.gclid,
  ga_client_id = EXCLUDED.ga_client_id,
  ga_session_id = EXCLUDED.ga_session_id,
  ga_session_number = EXCLUDED.ga_session_number,
  ga_session_timestamp = EXCLUDED.ga_session_timestamp,
  extracted_ad_id = EXCLUDED.extracted_ad_id,
  extracted_campaign_id = EXCLUDED.extracted_campaign_id,
  raw_code = EXCLUDED.raw_code,
  load_timestamp = NOW();

INSERT INTO dashboards.stg_fb_ads_daily (
  date_day, ad_id, ad_name, adset_id, adset_name,
  campaign_id, campaign_name, account_id,
  ad_status, adset_status, campaign_status, campaign_objective,
  impressions, clicks, spend, reach, frequency,
  ctr, cpc, cpm,
  ad_creative_id, actions, source_row_ids
)
SELECT
  fai.date_start as date_day,
  fai.ad_id,
  fai.ad_name,
  fai.adset_id,
  fas.name as adset_name,
  fai.campaign_id,
  fc.name as campaign_name,
  fai.account_id,

  fa.status as ad_status,
  fas.status as adset_status,
  fc.status as campaign_status,
  fc.objective as campaign_objective,

  SUM(fai.impressions) as impressions,
  SUM(fai.clicks) as clicks,
  SUM(fai.spend) as spend,
  NULL::BIGINT as reach,
  NULL::NUMERIC(10,4) as frequency,

  CASE
    WHEN SUM(fai.impressions) > 0
    THEN (SUM(fai.clicks)::NUMERIC / SUM(fai.impressions) * 100)::NUMERIC(10,4)
  END as ctr,

  CASE
    WHEN SUM(fai.clicks) > 0
    THEN (SUM(fai.spend) / SUM(fai.clicks))::NUMERIC(18,6)
  END as cpc,

  CASE
    WHEN SUM(fai.impressions) > 0
    THEN (SUM(fai.spend) / SUM(fai.impressions) * 1000)::NUMERIC(18,6)
  END as cpm,

  fa.ad_creative_id,
  NULL::JSONB as actions,
  NULL::INTEGER[] as source_row_ids

FROM raw.fb_ad_insights fai
LEFT JOIN raw.fb_ads fa ON fai.ad_id = fa.ad_id
LEFT JOIN raw.fb_adsets fas ON fai.adset_id = fas.adset_id
LEFT JOIN raw.fb_campaigns fc ON fai.campaign_id = fc.campaign_id

WHERE fai.date_start >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '90 days'
  AND fai.load_timestamp > COALESCE(
    (SELECT MAX(load_timestamp) FROM dashboards.stg_fb_ads_daily),
    '1970-01-01'::TIMESTAMP
  )

GROUP BY
  fai.date_start, fai.ad_id, fai.ad_name, fai.adset_id, fas.name,
  fai.campaign_id, fc.name, fai.account_id,
  fa.status, fas.status, fc.status, fc.objective,
  fa.ad_creative_id

ON CONFLICT (date_day, ad_id, campaign_id) DO UPDATE SET
  ad_name = EXCLUDED.ad_name,
  adset_name = EXCLUDED.adset_name,
  campaign_name = EXCLUDED.campaign_name,
  ad_status = EXCLUDED.ad_status,
  adset_status = EXCLUDED.adset_status,
  campaign_status = EXCLUDED.campaign_status,
  campaign_objective = EXCLUDED.campaign_objective,
  impressions = EXCLUDED.impressions,
  clicks = EXCLUDED.clicks,
  spend = EXCLUDED.spend,
  reach = EXCLUDED.reach,
  frequency = EXCLUDED.frequency,
  ctr = EXCLUDED.ctr,
  cpc = EXCLUDED.cpc,
  cpm = EXCLUDED.cpm,
  ad_creative_id = EXCLUDED.ad_creative_id,
  actions = EXCLUDED.actions,
  load_timestamp = NOW();

INSERT INTO dashboards.stg_google_ads_daily (
  date_day, campaign_id, campaign_name,
  ad_group_id, ad_group_name, ad_id,
  campaign_status, ad_group_status, ad_status,
  impressions, clicks, cost_micros, spend,
  conversions, conversion_value,
  ctr, cpc, cpm,
  device, network, source_table
)
SELECT
  date as date_day,
  campaign_id::TEXT,
  campaign_name,
  NULL as ad_group_id,
  NULL as ad_group_name,
  NULL as ad_id,

  campaign_status,
  NULL as ad_group_status,
  NULL as ad_status,

  SUM(impressions) as impressions,
  SUM(clicks) as clicks,
  SUM(cost_micros) as cost_micros,
  (SUM(cost_micros)::NUMERIC / 1000000)::NUMERIC(18,6) as spend,

  SUM(conversions) as conversions,
  SUM(conversions_value) as conversion_value,

  CASE
    WHEN SUM(impressions) > 0
    THEN (SUM(clicks)::NUMERIC / SUM(impressions) * 100)::NUMERIC(10,4)
  END as ctr,

  CASE
    WHEN SUM(clicks) > 0
    THEN (SUM(cost_micros)::NUMERIC / 1000000 / SUM(clicks))::NUMERIC(18,6)
  END as cpc,

  CASE
    WHEN SUM(impressions) > 0
    THEN (SUM(cost_micros)::NUMERIC / 1000000 / SUM(impressions) * 1000)::NUMERIC(18,6)
  END as cpm,

  NULL as device,
  NULL as network,
  'google_ads_campaign_daily' as source_table

FROM raw.google_ads_campaign_daily

WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '90 days'
  AND load_timestamp > COALESCE(
    (SELECT MAX(load_timestamp) FROM dashboards.stg_google_ads_daily),
    '1970-01-01'::TIMESTAMP
  )

GROUP BY date, campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_status

ON CONFLICT (date_day, campaign_id, COALESCE(ad_id, ''), COALESCE(device, ''))
DO UPDATE SET
  campaign_name = EXCLUDED.campaign_name,
  campaign_status = EXCLUDED.campaign_status,
  impressions = EXCLUDED.impressions,
  clicks = EXCLUDED.clicks,
  cost_micros = EXCLUDED.cost_micros,
  spend = EXCLUDED.spend,
  conversions = EXCLUDED.conversions,
  conversion_value = EXCLUDED.conversion_value,
  ctr = EXCLUDED.ctr,
  cpc = EXCLUDED.cpc,
  cpm = EXCLUDED.cpm,
  load_timestamp = NOW();

INSERT INTO dashboards.dim_product (product_id, product_name)
SELECT DISTINCT
  id_product as product_id,
  product as product_name
FROM raw.crm_orders
WHERE id_product IS NOT NULL
  AND product IS NOT NULL
  AND product != ''
ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET
  product_name = EXCLUDED.product_name,
  updated_at = NOW();
